wmndsDisruptionIndicatorMediumProps.name: contentText
wmndsDisruptionIndicatorMediumProps.description: Required. Text to describe the route name or number of the mode of transport.

wmndsDisruptionIndicatorMediumProps.name: iconRight
wmndsDisruptionIndicatorMediumProps.description: The icon tag which specifies the icon to show to the right of the indicator (see icon reference). Default value is general-warning-circle. By default, no icon will be displayed.

wmndsDisruptionIndicatorMediumProps.name: iconLeft
wmndsDisruptionIndicatorMediumProps.description: The icon tag which specifies the icon to show to the left of the indicator (see icon reference). Default value is modes-isolated-bus. By default, no icon will be displayed.

wmndsDisruptionIndicatorMediumProps.name: classes
wmndsDisruptionIndicatorMediumProps.description: List of aditional classes which will be added to the disruption indicator. Typical use cases are modifying the badge colour to indicate severity or displaying a narrow badge e.g. wmnds-disruption-indicator-medium--narrow
